name: 陳文斌
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
本課程將複習各項學 (包括靜學、動學、材學) 定，並介紹人體各主要骨骼肌肉系統之生物學。課程中以常之問題為實際應用各定，並簡介其他生物學相關域之應用。
schedule:
課程進度
1. Introduction
2. Kinematic concepts for analyzing human motion
3. Kinetic concepts for analyzing human motion
4. Biomechanics of bone
5. Biomechanics of the hip
6. Midterm exam
7. Biomechanics of the knee
8. Biomechanics of the spine
9. Biomechanics of the foot
10. Biomechanics of arthroplasty
11. Biomechanics of gait
12. FEM on Biomechanics
13. Oral paper report
14. Final exam
scorePolicy:
1. 平時成績 20%
2. 期中考 30%
3. 期末考 30%
4. 期末口頭及書面報告成績 20%
materials:
Basic Biomechanics 4th Edition, Susan J. Hall, WCB/McGraw Hill
Basic Biomechanics of the Musculoskeletal System, 3rd Ed. M. Nordin and V. H. Frankel
